type CompositeDataLoader<'Source, 'LastTransformer (requires 'LastTransformer : null and 'LastTransformer :> ITransformer)> = class interface IDataLoader<'Source>

Docs.summary: This class represents a data loader that applies a transformer chain after loading. It also has methods to save itself to a repository.
